verbs.description: The president 's lawyer [V: was] paid millions of dollars by clients who wanted his help navigating the Trump administration . But is what Cohen did the same as lobbying ?
[ARG2: The president 's lawyer] was [V: paid] [ARG1: millions of dollars] [ARG0: by clients who wanted his help navigating the Trump administration] . But is what Cohen did the same as lobbying ?
The president 's lawyer was paid millions of dollars by [ARG0: clients] [R-ARG0: who] [V: wanted] [ARG1: his help navigating the Trump administration] . But is what Cohen did the same as lobbying ?
The president 's lawyer was paid millions of dollars by clients who wanted [ARG0: his help] [V: navigating] [ARG1: the Trump administration] . But is what Cohen did the same as lobbying ?
The president 's lawyer was paid millions of dollars by clients who wanted his help navigating the Trump administration . But [V: is] [ARG2: what Cohen did the same as lobbying] ?
The president 's lawyer was paid millions of dollars by clients who wanted his help navigating the Trump administration . But is [ARG1: what] [ARG0: Cohen] [V: did] [ARGM-MNR: the same as lobbying] ?
The president 's lawyer was paid millions of dollars by clients who wanted his help navigating the Trump administration . But is what [ARG0: Cohen] did the same as [V: lobbying] ?
